title: msbuild package modify the html file name to lower case
body:
### Steps to reproduce
use the msbuild to package the website

Directory contents:
```
/
- NLBControl.html
```

Command line
```
##[command]"C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\15.0\Bin\msbuild.exe" "C:\agent\_work\27\s\*.csproj" /nologo /nr:false /dl:CentralLogger,"C:\agent\_work\_tasks\VSBuild_71a9a2d3-a98a-4caa-96ab-affca411ecda\1.126.0\ps_modules\MSBuildHelpers\Microsoft.TeamFoundation.DistributedTask.MSBuild.Logger.dll";"RootDetailId=ec92a2e8-dac7-4dae-a2dd-0bcc949422d2|SolutionDir=C:\agent\_work\27\s\*"*ForwardingLogger,"C:\agent\_work\_tasks\VSBuild_71a9a2d3-a98a-4caa-96ab-affca411ecda\1.126.0\ps_modules\MSBuildHelpers\Microsoft.TeamFoundation.DistributedTask.MSBuild.Logger.dll" /p:DeployOnBuild=true /p:WebPublishMethod=Package /p:PackageAsSingleFile=true /p:SkipInvalidConfigurations=true /p:OutPutPath="bin\release" /p:PackageLocation="C:\agent\_work\27\a\\" /p:platform="any cpu" /p:configuration="release" /p:VisualStudioVersion="15.0" /p:_MSDeployUserAgent="TFS_dbc3d016-85b4-4c1e-abff-3e6e2a576322_build_40_1468"
```
### Expected  behavior
the name of static html still is "NLBControl.html" in the web deploy package

### Actual behavior
it is changed to nlbcontrol.html

### Environment data
`msbuild /15.0` output:

OS info:
windows server 2016
